properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova nee gudaramu praminchuchunanu 2 Thejomahima niluchu sthalamunu premincheda nenu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova nannu theerchumu nadachithini nyayamuga 2 Neeyande nammika yunchithi nanu kavuna nenu jaari padanu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}sodhinchu anthareenriyamul pareekshimpumu nahrudayam Vatsalyatha naa yedhuta nunchi nadachuchunaanu sathyamutho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhakthi heenulatho sangathyam dhustula sangha masahyam Koranu sneham nirupayogulatho vyardhulathonu nenu naduvan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kadigedhanu naachethulu nirdhosha jalamula yundhun Yehovaa nee balipeetamu chuttu pradakshinamunu ne chethun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needhu ascharya karyamul deva nenu varninthunu Kruthagnathatho na sthuthulu chellinchi yelugethi geethamul padedhan{/lang-eng}
